content:
FragmentNavigationEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle FragmentNavigation events.

In this Article

public delegate void FragmentNavigationEventHandler(object sender, FragmentNavigationEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
FragmentNavigationEventHandler

Remarks

This event handler is used for the following events:

  • System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation
  • System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation
  • System.Windows.Controls.Frame.FragmentNavigation
  • System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation
